actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to increase to 16 cents per mile the mileage allowance payable to persons visiting Veterans' Administration medical and other facilities.

summary.text: Increases to 16 cents per mile the mileage allowance payable to persons visiting Veterans' Administration medical and other facilities. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 111(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to increase to 16 cents per mile the mileage allowance payable to persons visiting Veterans' Administration medical and other facilities.
